body:
Dear Chris, It seems the 3D chart doesn't work for an analysis period of just 2 days (see image 2 below) and the visualization is a bit weird for just one day which I assume is related how mesh is created in Rhino (see image 1), and the value label works fine with analysis period of 3 days or longer (see image 3).
Hope you can advise! Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lnNHCVxKyAJ-*18u6cED59n9OJKDW7zJXzN1MuKm8oQCeZoRctepI6TQVwFFKpb5BW2-JfJqnq55W*KQWMRX3uTV0nFg6iA-/01.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lnNHCVxKyAJL4hC-4QuDSx*mjWPzc*cwYuGEz6pJD53rIlRh19rruyw1tGzaaiUZazf4CKWuFaj36yhWrsQpqGET0HXSBPSH/02.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lnNHCVxKyAJP8L3esKzxT*D5QoApUWGhFG817k1ZLsJMjVcgIMc3mYVthIP1lCquMd3V63V5QLkXUpM5qtO8M4irMAySRMG4/03.PNG)
